sentences.en: “Out of 54 potential jurors, they knocked 20 off . . . just for openers”(&b{Joseph DiMona})
sentences.cn: “一开局，他们就击败了54个实力选手中的20个选手”(&b{约瑟夫·迪莫纳})

sentences.en: A bottle opener is a kitchen gadget.
Can I borrow your can opener?
sentences.cn: 可以借用你的开罐器 吗 ?
首先，我们选用罐装的龙虾。

sentences.en: His book was an eye opener to complacent young men.
sentences.cn: 对自满的年轻人来说,他的这本书有启发作用.

sentences.en: I bought a bottle opener yesterday.
In the audio and video industry, sisvel is an eye opener.
sentences.cn: 在音视频行业, sisvel可谓是大名鼎鼎.

sentences.en: Love is blind, but marriage is a real eye - opener.
sentences.cn: 爱是盲目的, 婚姻的眼睛可是雪亮.(唉,本应盲下去的. )

sentences.en: Television is a real eye - opener.
THE CAN OPENER BROKE, SO I TRIED USING A KNIFE.
sentences.cn: 罐头的启子坏了, 所以我试着用一把小刀.

sentences.en: The chart is below, and it's both an eye - opener and a spine - tingler.
sentences.cn: 以下是比较图表, 让人既 茅塞顿开 ,也脊背发凉.

sentences.en: The film on police Methods : Was a real eye - opener for me.
sentences.cn: 这部关于警方探案招数的影片使我大开眼界.

sentences.en: This revealing the food industry insider's book will make you an eye - opener!
sentences.cn: 这本大爆食品工业内幕的书将会使你大开眼界!

sentences.en: This tin - opener is awfully fiddly.
Well, here's the bottle opener, and here's the flashlight.
sentences.cn: 哦, 这是开瓶器, 这是手电筒.

sentences.en: What an eye - opener it's been for me!

words.tran_cn: 公开的；敞开的；空旷的；坦率的；营业着的
开始；机会；通路；空缺的职位

trans.tran_en: a tool that is used to open cans, bottles etc
